synopsis.text: Magical adventures resume for Doremi and her friends as they unexpectedly find themselves back in the enchanting Witch World! After bidding farewell to their magical abilities and returning to their ordinary lives, the girls stumble upon a secret garden and witness the birth of a special baby, Hana-chan, the future queen of the Witch World. The queen entrusts Doremi and her friends with the responsibility of raising Hana-chan for a year, offering them even stronger magical powers in return. As the four young friends navigate the challenges of caring for a baby while still being children themselves, they must also protect Hana-chan from various evil characters who seek to kidnap her. With newfound powers and a precious life to safeguard, Doremi and her friends embark on a thrilling journey filled with love, laughter, and magical surprises.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
